Introduction¶

Madame is a RESTful API for MongoDB built on Flask. It tends to be highly customizable and easy to use and configure.

Features¶

  • REST-compliant
  • HATEOAS
  • Dynamic collections
  • JSON Schemas separated from code
  • JSON Validation
  • Cache
  • Versioning
  • Read-only by default
